Key Arguments: Misinformation and disinformation have sometimes been proven correct over time.
Accusations of misinformation have been used as tools of propaganda and intimidation by governments and corporations.
Freedom of speech should not be feared and can counteract untruthful information.
It is dangerous for a small group of powerful people to decide what is correct information.
Notable Quotes: Misinformation and disinformation has proved to be correct with the passage of time.
Freedom of speech should not be feared.
It is simply too dangerous to have a small group of people in powerful positions adjudicate what is correct information.
